mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( user_id, password, name, birth, phone, address, email, email_agreed, sms_agreed, hint_id, hint_answer, join_date ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{email}, #{emailAgreed}, #{smsAgreed}, #{hintId}, #{hintAnswer}, #{joinDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET phone = #{phone}, address = #{address}, email = #{email}, email_agreed = #{emailAgreed}, sms_agreed = #{smsAgreed}, hint_id = #{hintId}, hint_answer = #{hintAnswer} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM users WHERE name = #{name} AND email = #{email}
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_withdraw ( user_no, user_id, password, name, birth, phone, address, email, email_agreed, sms_agreed, hint_answer, refresh_token, reason, withdraw_date ) VALUES ( #{vo.userNo}, #{vo.userId}, #{vo.password}, #{vo.name}, #{vo.birth}, #{vo.phone}, #{vo.address}, #{vo.email}, #{vo.emailAgreed}, #{vo.smsAgreed}, #{vo.hintAnswer}, #{vo.refreshToken}, #{reason}, NOW() )
